level.heading: Application of subchapter.
level.text: This subchapter applies to registrations of securities in beneficiary form made before or after the effective date of this act [April 27, 2001], by decedents dying on or after the effective date of this act [April 27, 2001].

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-292
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-292, see notes following ยง 19-601.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 405 of the Uniform Nonprobate Transfers on Death Act (1991 Act).
